attributes.action: make benefit claimants work for their benefits
attributes.additional_details:
this petition proposes that all persons who claim job seekers allowance must arrive at their job centre on sign on day at 6.30 am ready for work.

there will then be a random draw of people who are needed to work that day who will take on tasks such as sorting recycling or planting trees, thus reducing the bill to local councils for labor and giving the claimants a chance to build a work reference for future employment.
